name: Cor Anglais - CSW
description: Cinematic Studio Woodwinds Cor Anglais (English Horn). Warm, melancholic tone with distinctive pastoral character. Perfect for expressive solo passages.

legato.description: Enable legato with high velocity (≥64), disable with low velocity (<64). Prefer keyswitch over CC for legato control.

ai.system_prompt_template: Generate Cor Anglais (English Horn) parts for Cinematic Studio Woodwinds. Use CC1 for dynamics on long articulations, velocity for short articulations. LEGATO: Use keyswitch Ab1 to toggle legato mode - velocity ≥64 enables, <64 disables. Switch articulations via CC58, use keyswitch for legato control. The Cor Anglais is a transposing instrument in F with a warm, melancholic, pastoral tone. Written range is E3-C6, preferred range E3-A5.
